dmca.title: [ABUSE] [#25839556] Legal Notice from Google May 6, 2005]
dmca.body:
Tm

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, May 06, 2005 1:34 PM
To: legal-support@google.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] [#25839556] Legal Notice from Google May 6, 2005]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] [#25839556] Legal Notice from Google May 6, 2005
Date: Fri, 06 May 2005 08:37:09 -0700
From: Google Legal Support <legal-support@google.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
CC: admins@theplanet.com

Dear Sirs:

I am trademark counsel for Google Inc. We have become aware that someone on
your network is posting messages on newsgroups that includes a link to a
page not authorized by Google that invites the recipient to sign-in to
Google's Gmail service. The link in the posting is <
http://www.mechanized.us/gmail/index.php >, which I understand to be on your
network.

Google has not authorized this party to use our name and trademark.
This party is fraudulently associating himself/herself with Google to
illegally gather personal information and email addresses.

Accordingly, we ask that you assist us by disabling the site <
http://www.mechanized.us/gmail/index.php >

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Tu Tsao
Trademark Counsel
Google Inc.
Phone: 650-253-4000



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCe7h+vK/XpJs6oyURAtuzAJ9/+eZHWYYZh1Xa97aPxRYc/w/0SACeLRsC
co9cz3iV5Ydpw3fGfW80HRQ=
=jY8z
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
